title: Fix: UI becomes unresponsive when saving devlog entry in details page
description: The user interface becomes unresponsive or non-interactive when saving a devlog entry in the devlog details page. This creates a poor user experience as users cannot tell if the save operation is in progress, has completed, or has failed. The UI should provide feedback during save operations and remain responsive.

context.businessContext: Poor UI responsiveness during save operations creates a frustrating user experience and can lead to data loss if users attempt to navigate away or reload the page during save operations. This undermines user confidence in the application's reliability.
context.technicalContext: This is likely a frontend issue in the React web application where save operations may be blocking the UI thread or not providing proper loading states. The issue could involve async operation handling, state management, or user feedback mechanisms.
acceptanceCriteria: Save operations show loading indicator or progress feedback
UI remains interactive during save operations
Clear success/error messages are displayed after save completion
Save button is disabled during operation to prevent duplicate requests
Users can cancel ongoing save operations if needed

keyInsights: This affects the devlog details page specifically
Issue impacts save operations for devlog entries
May require investigation of React state management and async handling
Could involve both frontend UI state and backend API interaction patterns
